name: Mergeggs!
description:
Mergeggs! is a relaxing game to keep you enjoying for hours with gorgeous eggs. Match & merge to discover eggs! Enjoy the beauty of discovering new eggs.

The idea of the game is so easy, you got eggs on the screen and you just need to match & merge the egss to discover new one. Use "fill" button to add eggs on all the empty areas. You can also use "automerge" button to match & merge automatically.

Match & merge to discover eggs!

Features:

‣ Minimalist design
‣ Automerge option
‣ Fill all areas option
‣ Global Leader-boards
‣ Relaxing music and sounds
‣ Dark mode
‣ Egg store
